data.title: American Airlines Newark – EWR Airport Airlines
data.meta_description: American Airlines Newark passengers can check one more thing off their to-do list while getting low parking rates when they book at NALTP.
data.text:
American Airlines at Newark Airport

How to Save on EWR Parking When Flying With American Airlines

Whether you are planning a quick business trip or a longer vacation, Newark Airport Long Term Parking is here to help you save on parking. American Airlines Newark passengers can park at our off-site lot that is located just 2 miles from EWR airport. With lower rates than on-site Newark Airport parking and no need for you to navigate the airport area, Newark Airport Long Term Parking is a great choice for your next trip. You can make a reservation here on our website and we’ll be waiting to take you to the American Airlines Newark terminal so you can catch your flight.

About American Airlines and Newark Airport

Headquartered in Fort Worth, TX, American Airlines is the largest airline in the United States. Founded in 1926, AA now has nearly 6,800 flights per day to well over 300 destinations across the globe. American Airlines operates the second most flights through Newark Airport. With foreign and domestic flights regularly available American Airlines is sure to have a destination for your next trip. American Airlines Newark is located in Terminal A on level 3, and the IATA code is AA.

Convenient EWR Parking for American Airlines Passengers

When you fly on American Airlines out of Newark, you know you can trust that you’ll reach your destination safely and on time. At Newark Airport Long Term Parking we do everything we can to help your trip go smoothly. The last thing you want is the hassle of parking at EWR airport and having to drag your luggage around causing you to miss your flight. Not only will we reserve your parking spot for you, but we’ll also get you right to the American Airlines Newark terminal in minutes after you park.

Our facility is located a half-mile closer to Terminal A than the economy parking lot at Newark Airport so right off the bat you will be saving time getting to your flight. Our off-site Newark Airport parking lot helps eliminate the added hassle of travel on the day of your trip by offering affordable and convenient parking.
